colorTheory.description: This color palette combines a classic black and white base with a vibrant teal accent to create a professional yet modern look.
colorTheory.mood: The palette exudes sophistication, trustworthiness, and creativity.
colorTheory.accessibility: The high contrast between the text and background colors ensures readability and complies with WCAG AA standards.
colorTheory.colorRelationships: The black and white combination provides a strong foundation, while the teal accent adds a refreshing pop of color for emphasis and visual appeal.
